entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as speaking irritably to Harry. She is described as looking around for Winky.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as muttering about sending stuff to Snuffles and asking the elves for extra food.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as agreeing with Harry's idea of sending stuff to Snuffles and asking the elves for extra food.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as quietly answering Hermione's question about Winky's whereabouts.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is described as sitting by the fire, looking filthy and unwashed.

entities.name: snuffles
entities.description: Snuffles is mentioned as someone Harry wants to send stuff to.

entities.name: pig
entities.description: Pig is mentioned as something Ron suggests giving Winky to do.

relationships.description: Harry has a plan to send stuff to Snuffles, as mentioned in the conversation with Ron.
Ron suggests giving Pig something to do, which is a task for Winky.
Hermione is concerned about Winky's status and asks Dobby where she is.
